casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Pierre Je Bron MOORE 243P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 28, 2017 Meghan Adelle Jones, Attorney at Law, for Moore, Pierre Je Bron. Joseph E. Herrin, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of July 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of July 2017."
